pkd(8) System Manager's Manual pkd(8)

NAME

pkd —
management and supervision daemon for plug-in services

SYNOPSIS

pkd

DESCRIPTION

pkd manages plug-ins for the PlugInKit subsystem. It is a classic launch agent managed by launchd.

SEE ALSO

pluginkit(8) xpc(3)

BUGS

None yet.

HISTORY

Pkd was first introduced in OS X 10.9.

Pkd used to have a -v verbose option to increase logging. This is now accomplished through the logging system by enabling the "info" or "debug" levels of logging for the "com.apple.pluginkit" subsystem.

1/22/14 Darwin
